name: Tyrann
overview: Tyrann. - Here is a role-playing adventure game that takes you to the medieval village of Golanur. Six characters, created at the start of the game, will act under your orders. Your team formed, it must be armed and protected. Send your characters one by one to the stall. Their fortune varies according to their caste: it is sometimes necessary to combine the money of two of them to arm a third. As for the adventure, two levels of play are available: on side A of the tape, a nine-level maze will allow you to train and meet monsters, each one more deadly than the other. When the team has reached, on average, the eleventh level of experience, the B-side will plunge them into the secret of Tyrann, the real goal of the game.In a labyrinth much larger than the previous one, you will then discover new spells whose meaning will have to be penetrated. Don't let your hit points decrease too much. The great alchemist can easily get you back on your feet but his prices are up to the service he provides you. A captivating game.
